metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3257 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server: InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 5.6.34 and earlier5.7.16 and earlier. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3257` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this CVE was omitted from the USN-3174 update changelogs and USN by mistake.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mysql-5.7 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
